sourcesContent:
<template>
  <nav>
    <router-link to="/">Chocolate Factories</router-link> |
    <router-link to="/addfactory">Add Factory</router-link> |
    <router-link to="/addlocation">Add Location</router-link> |
    <router-link to="/addmanager">Add Manager</router-link> |
    <router-link to="/addworker">Add Worker</router-link> |
    <router-link to="/addchocolate">Add Chocolate</router-link> |
    
    <!-- Link za Users vidljiv samo ako je userRole ADMIN -->
    <router-link v-if="userRole === 'ADMIN'" to="/users">Users</router-link> |

    <router-link to="/managerview">Manager Dashboard</router-link> |
    <router-link to="/workerview">Worker Dashboard</router-link> |
    <router-link to="/register">Register</router-link> |
    <router-link to="/login">Login</router-link> |
    <router-link to="/logout">Logout</router-link> |
    <router-link to="/profile">Profile</router-link> |
  </nav>
  <router-view/>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      userRole: '' // ili null ako čekate da se podaci učitaju
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    // Pretpostavimo da dobijate trenutnu ulogu korisnika iz nekog servisa ili Vuex store-a
    this.getCurrentUserRole();
  },
  methods: {
    getCurrentUserRole() {
      // Primer dohvaćanja uloge korisnika, može biti iz lokalnog skladišta, Vuex-a ili backend servisa
      const storedUserRole = localStorage.getItem('userRole'); // Primer sa lokalnim skladištem
      if (storedUserRole) {
        this.userRole = storedUserRole;
      } else {
        // Fallback ili default vrednost
        this.userRole = 'GUEST'; // ili neka druga vrednost
      }
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
}

nav {
  padding: 30px;
}

nav a {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #2c3e50;
}

nav a.router-link-exact-active {
  color: #42b983;
}
</style>
